<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><child display_value="Hello Marek">3f0e5ec4db5b401006fc7b60399619e9</child><cloned>2020-02-26 11:53:06</cloned><last_validated>2020-02-26 11:53:06</last_validated><parent display_value="Hello World 3">403fd3b35b3112000d7ec7ad31f91ac2</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>sample</category><client_script><![CDATA[function() {
	var c = this;	
	c.display = function() {						
		c.server.update().then(function(data) {		
			console.log("message", data.message)
		})		
	}
	
	c.display();
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>h1 {
color: #428bca;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data>{
	"data": {
		"sometext": "world"
	}
}</demo_data><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>true</has_preview><id>hello-world-3</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function(scope, element) {	
	var el = $(element[0]).find('input');	
	scope.$evalAsync(function() {
		el.focus();	
	});
}]]></link><name>Hello World 3</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[(function() {	
	if (input) {
		data.message = (input.sometext.length > 0) ? "Hello " + input.sometext + "!" : "";
  }
})();]]></script><servicenow>true</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_widget</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-03 21:22:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>403fd3b35b3112000d7ec7ad31f91ac2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hello World 3</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">f66ddd7c74e0330078509adcc48c87da</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_widget_403fd3b35b3112000d7ec7ad31f91ac2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-08-24 19:04:03</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div>
 Enter your name:
 <input type="text" ng-model="c.data.sometext" ng-model-options="{debounce: 50}" ng-change="c.display()"/>
 <h1>{{ c.data.message }}</h1>
</div>]]></template></sp_widget></payload><sys_class_name>sp_rel_widget_clone</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>marek.polasik</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-26 11:53:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>f70e5ec4db5b401006fc7b60399619ee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>3f0e5ec4db5b401006fc7b60399619e9</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Examer" source="x_84446_examer">163db7a7db7a001006fc7b603996198f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Examer">163db7a7db7a001006fc7b603996198f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rel_widget_clone_f70e5ec4db5b401006fc7b60399619ee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>marek.polasik</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-26 11:53:06</sys_updated_on></sp_rel_widget_clone></record_update>
